articles.description: As the financial year is near to its end, it is high-time for tax payers to recheck their investments and opt for the unutilised ones to ensure optimum tax savings. Here are the top tax-saving investment options people can consider before 31 March
articles.content: As the current financial year inches closer to its end, so is your last opportunity to save tax on your income this year. After 31 March, taxpayers won't be able to use different tax-saving instrumen… [+5900 chars]

articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Avalon Technologies' Rs 865 crore-IPO to open for subscription on April 3 - Economic Times
articles.description: The company has cut the size of its IPO to Rs 865 crore from Rs 1,025 crore planned earlier. The reduction in the IPO size was a result of the pre-IPO placement carried out by the company, which amounted to Rs 160 crore.
articles.content: The Rs 865 crore-initial public offering (IPO) of electronic manufacturing services firm Avalon Technologies will open for subscription on 3rd April 2023. The 4-day IPO will close on April 6, and the… [+1893 chars]

articles.title: Five of top 10-firms lose Rs 86,447 crore in m-cap; Infosys, TCS, SBI hit hard - The Economic Times
